mapper.select: select * from (select emp_no, a_date,a_time,l_time,time_chk,time_etc, rownum as rno from comchk where emp_no = 1 order by rno) where rno betWeen #{counts}*10-9 and #{counts}*10 order by rno
select * from ( select GIVE_DATE, NOTE, SAL, rownum as rno from sal_list where emp_no = 1 order by GIVE_DATE desc) where rno betWeen #{counts}*10-9 and #{counts}*10 order by rno
